rule: The output must be crafted in a single paragraph.
input: A couple dancing in the rain on a cobblestone street at night under streetlights. The photo should have a romantic and nostalgic feel.
validityText:
The input complies well with the requirement for focusing on the subjects and their characteristics: "A couple dancing in the rain". It includes details on timing "at night", and lighting "under streetlights". It adequately describes the background and setting "on a cobblestone street". The input also conveys the feeling the image should evoke: "romantic and nostalgic feel". It is written in one paragraph and does not exceed 80 words. The input is precise and uses artistic insight.

OK
coverageText: A couple dancing passionately in the rain on a cobblestone street under the soft glow of streetlights at night. The couple's clothes are slightly soaked, adding to the enchantment. The streetlights cast warm, golden reflections on the wet cobblestones, creating a magical ambiance. The background features charming, old-world buildings with dimly lit windows. The photo should evoke a sense of romance and nostalgia, capturing a timeless and tender moment amidst a serene, drizzly night.
